examples.example: 虽然遇到了困难，但我们只能勇往直前，努力去克服。

translate.english: Although we have encountered difficulties, we can only move forward bravely and try hard to overcome them.

examples.example: 我们在前进的道路上遇到挫折时，只能坚定信念继续前行。

translate.english: When we encounter setbacks on the way forward, we can only firm our beliefs and move on.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么情况，我们都只能保持乐观积极的心态去面对。

translate.english: No matter what situation we encounter, we can only keep an optimistic and positive attitude to face it.
